title: Smart Data Models - Data Service Run extension to DCAT-AP
description: A representation of one specific run of a data service (e.g. DataServiceDCAT-AP).

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be DataServiceRun

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

resultEntities.description: Relationship. A list of references pointing to NGSI-LD entities that were generated within a service run.

resultExternal.description: Property. A list of uri pointing to external results that were generated within a service run.

sourceEntities.description: Relationship. A list of references pointing to NGSI-LD entities that acted as source within a service run.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

sourceExternal.description: Property. A list of uri pointing to external results that acted as source within a service run.

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

service.description: Relationship. A reference pointing to the NGSI-LD entity representing the corresponding data service (e.g. of type DataServiceDCAT-AP).

configuration.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/StructuredValue'. Technical configuration of the service. This attribute is intended to be an array of properties and their values which capture parameters which have to do with the configuration of a service (output format, URL, etc.) and which are not currently covered by the standard attributes defined by this model.
